title: Late comers who miss Isha form another congregation knowing Taraweeh is about to begin
transcript: tomorrow says whenever the congregation of Asia is over we get late comers making another congregation knowing that in a few minutes the Imam will start telling is this permissible dancers know they are late comers they should wait until the Imam begins to make the taraweeh they join him in taraweeh with the intention of Asia he finishes the first two rakahs offers Saddam they stand up for the third and fourth raka of Asia and then join him for taraweeh
